name: Bapi execution is unsuccessful for PO BAPI-BAPI_PO_CREATE1 using invalid Purchase organisation payload

steps.name: Given  Base Url is known to connect with loadbalancer connection connection and has invalid Purchase organisation "PurchaseOrderFRE.CreateFromData1" payload and autocommit "true" replace "CURRENCY": "EUR" with "CURRENCY": "xyz"
When  user calls the bapi execution by "bapiExecution" with GET http request
Then  API call got success with Bapi list with status code 200
And  Verify RETURN[0].MESSAGE has error message Currency key is unknown

fullName: Bapi List and schema: Bapi execution is unsuccessful for PO BAPI-BAPI_PO_CREATE1 using invalid Purchase organisation payload
